    • Method Detail

      • generateSecret

        private static java.lang.String generateSecret(byte headerId,
                                               byte[] secret)
        Generates a secret based on the specified header ID and secret data. The secret you are generating should simply be the raw data you want to send over; uniqueness, encryption, compression, and conversion to base 64 is done automatically.
        Parameters:
        headerId - the header ID to ensure uniqueness.
        secret - the secret.
        Returns:
        the unique secret.

      • parseSecret

        protected static byte[] parseSecret(java.lang.String secret)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Converts the compressed and encrypted secret back to a normal byte array.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret to convert.
        Returns:
        the parsed secret.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if decompression fails or the header ID is not valid.

        public boolean isJoinEnabled()
        Returns:
        true if joining is enabled, false if joining is disabled.

        public void setJoinEnabled(boolean enabled)

      • isSpectateEnabled

      • setJoinSecret

        public void setJoinSecret(byte[] secret)
        Sets the join secret. The secret being set should simply be the raw data you want to send over; uniqueness, encryption, compression, and conversion to base 64 is done automatically.
        Parameters:
        secret - the secret.
